entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Oxtongue Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:29 a.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.8Â°C

Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 1:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

Humidity: 96 %

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming west 30 after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. A few showers beginning near noon. Wind south 20 km/h. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
